hello. Does anyone know how can i look the kernel messages when the system is booting ? like in SuSE "verbose mode"
when booting press shift to enter grub menu. once there press e to enter edit mode. remove the quiet and splash keywords from the kernel line. crtl + x to boot into the edited kernel
